body_html: I'm not talking about gradients, I'm talking about backwards compatibility guarantees for the API. We cannot change the current behavior (the delimiter string will be unpacked into a set of single characters). We have to find a backwards compatible version for the signature of string_split does doesn't change the current behavior.
